MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of Mount Melville. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:48pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a faulty fuse unit within the Mount Melville Home Farm transformer and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:00pm on Monday, 8th February 2021
